sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"
import MaterialIcon from "material-icons-react"
import {
  Title,
  Location,
  Image,
  Specification,
  Item,
  ItemTitle,
  ItemSubTitle,
} from "./styles/banner"
import { ReactComponent as LocationSVG } from "./img/location.svg"
import "./styles/banner.css"

class Banner extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.state = {}
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <>
        <Title>Authentic Wildlife (Start New Orleans)</Title>
        <Location>
          <LocationSVG style={{ marginRight: "10px" }} />
          Brisbane, QLD
        </Location>
        <Image src="./img/wildlife.png" alt="wildLife" />
        <Specification>
          <Item>
            <MaterialIcon icon="update" size={55} color="#3ab2b3" />
            <ItemTitle>Duration</ItemTitle>
            <ItemSubTitle>3-5 hours</ItemSubTitle>
          </Item>
          <Item>
            <MaterialIcon icon="group" size={55} color="#3ab2b3" />
            <ItemTitle>Group</ItemTitle>
            <ItemSubTitle>10 People</ItemSubTitle>
          </Item>
          <Item>
            <MaterialIcon icon="today" size={55} color="#3ab2b3" />
            <ItemTitle>Start Date</ItemTitle>
            <ItemSubTitle>31 Aug 2021</ItemSubTitle>
          </Item>
        </Specification>
      </>
    )
  }
}

export default Banner
